properties.entry: SELECT REVIEW_NO , TITLE , CONTENT , TO_CHAR(WRITE_DATE, 'YY/MM/DD HH:MI:SS') WRITE_DATE , STAR_POINT , ORDER_NO , ITEM.ITEM_CODE FROM REVIEW JOIN ITEM ON REVIEW.REVIEW_NO = ITEM.ITEM_CODE WHERE DELETE_STATUS = 'Y' AND REVIEW_NO = ? ORDER BY WRITE_DATE DESC
UPDATE REVIEW SET DELETE_STATUS = 'N' WHERE REVIEW_NO = ?
